title: The Nicosystem's™ Beginner Terran Builds:
description: Hello everyone! This is a collection of builds I recommend newcomer and veteran Terran players alike to start learning in order to succeed in tournament series and on ladder.

title: Sc2 Tools for Improvement #2: Big Brain Game
description: Learn how to play the 'Big Brain Game' - thinking multiple steps ahead and making strategic decisions in StarCraft 2.

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks #72: When to A-move vs When to Right click
description: This video goes over the differential of when to a-move vs when to right click and specific situations for each.

title: Simple Early Game Zerg Setup vs Protoss
description: This video goes over how you want to position your queens and when to get your spores / how to scout.

title: Diamond 2 Coaching session with Equinox
description: This is a current up to date coaching session with equinox that I wanted to showcase so people can see my coaching style

title: Mentality Coaching: How to make a comeback
description: We have all been on the backfoot time and time again, but there is no victory sweeter than the victory one makes from being behind.

title: New Patch, New ZERG STYLE
description: Zerg style vs Terran Mech

title: How to Engage Tanks in TvT
description: This video goes over how to engage tanks as bio in TvT

description: Old school but still relevant way to delay and buy yourself time to properly deal with a cannon into tempest rush

description: This video showcases a proper response to cannon rush as zerg

description: This video goes over how to set and use camera locations in starcraft

title: Mentality Coaching: How to navigate a basetrade
description: This video goes over how to navigate a basetrade, the mentality surrounding it and how your goals should shift to accommodate your new updated goal

description: This video showcases how to take advantage of terrain and abuse it to your advantage by showcasing a disgusting tank spot on tokamak

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks: Speed mining rally
description: This tip video shows you how to set a rally to speed mine on worker creation

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks: How and When to Tech Switch
description: In this video we discuss the importance of being able to switch tech paths very quickly and how to do so effectively

title: Alternative TvT opener: Marauder Reaper into Mech
description: This is a game where I showcase an alternative eco cheese opening in tvt that lets you skip the raven bs phase entirely if you are lucky and will outright win the game sometimes.

title: Starcraft Tips and Tricks: Pick up Repair
description: Did you know scvs can repair while they are flying? this video goes over how to execute it and situations where it is useful.

description: Coaching video for Starcraft 2

title: Starcraft2 Tips and Tricks #64 Fixing Zerg macro
description: This is a common issue I see among zerg players of all skill levels. We are losing out on a bunch of mining time every game by having drones run around for no reason.

title: Zerg Scouting Against Protoss
description: In this video HinO goes over how to scout against protoss

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks Series #63: Base Centralization (WORKS FOR ALL RACES)
description: This is a tool any player can use to up the smoothness of their gameplay. This is something that I learned recently and wanted to share with the community.

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks #62: Defense tip for Terran Players + BONUS tip for High level Terrans
description: This video showcases a good defensive tool for terrans of any level as well as a slightly higher level maneuver to kill annoying probes as a moral victory against toss

description: This video showcases how to make a full wall that is escapable as protoss

title: Starcraft 2 Tips and Tricks: Effectively Dealing with Economy Harassment
description: A How-To Guide on dealing with worker harassment that shows you how to mitigate lost mining time and get more resources back faster.

description: An example and explanation of what playing the player instead of the matchup looks like, Featuring NetMech

title: Sc2 fundamental Skills

Looking at TVP from a perspective of constant aggression in the first stage of the game. 

This is a really good opener to ultimately keep protoss on their toes!

description:
Hi all,

title: Scouting Zerg with 3cc Hellion Banshee
description: Hello everyone! In this video I show you guys the current golden standard build of TvZ alongside how to effectively scout your opponent with key timings at a high level.

title: The Nicosystem™ 5-1-1 Tank Push vs Toss
description: Hello everyone! This is the 5-1-1 Tank push vs toss using double gas, the most standard and effective TvP build currently available to use on ladder. Focused on exploited tosses' weakest defence aside from ultra-late game which is the 3rd timing, this build gears on shutting down the protoss before they can scale uncontrollably.

title: The Nicosystem™ 2-1-1 Stimbat Guide
description: Hello everyone! This is the legendary GamerRichy's stimbat build that he has passed along to me to share with you guys. A modified version of 2-1-1 this build catches many Zergs offguard and has led to many successful ladder wins. One of my favourite builds, it is also one I recommend most Terrans to learn as it teaches a different style of the game to the standard 3cc builds.

title: Krystianer Masterclass: New Patch (PvZ & PvP & PvT) + Live Games
Nicoract Terran Masterclass
Mixu Masterclass
Mixu Masterclass - Ladder Game 1
The Nicosystem™ Beginner Terran Builds: TvT Defensive Gas First
description: Hello everyone, this build is designed for defensive oriented players that like having an economical advantage. You can be on level playing field vs double gas openers but with additional income as long as you play defensively. This catapults you ahead in the mid-lategame where you can snowball this economic lead.

title: ZvT ling queen opener into nydus allin (anti BC)
description: Zvt against Juggernaut Jason with a standard opener showcasing a counter to Terran's Battle Cruiser openings.

title: A quick guide to 12 pool worker pull ZvP
description: Learn the basic setup of a 12pool worker pull, how to execute, and a small micro lesson with workers

title: ZvX Learning the basic Zerg build order
description: Learn what the basic Zerg order looks like as well as how your macro cycle should be at the start and later stages of the game.

title: Worker Micro Tutorials
description: Learn how to micro workers with ease for all races

title: ZvT Gasless 4 queen opener into roach hydra
description: Guide to how a gasless opener works versus Terran and a quick rundown of roach hydra engagements and positioning. Game covers some late game aspects for the transitions as well.

title: ZvT defending early game pressure using Pool First
description: showcasing early game defense using a pool first opener and how to respond. Roughly after 6 minutes in game it becomes a treat as it progresses to lategame.

title: ZvP Defending a proxy 4 gate
description: how to defend proxy 4 gate flower and general response

title: The Nicosystem™ Blue-flame Hellion Timing Guide
description: Here's a safer version of a CC-first blue-flame hellion cheese I've been working on, using a second factory to overwhelm Zerg players with a mass amount of hellions diving for their workers.

title: Eco with Nico - A Nicosystem™ Guide to Greed and Cheese:
description: One of the key principles in Starcraft is having a strong economy because having a larger army or more upgrades usually lends a strategic advantage to winning games. Many players like having a strong economy so here are some strong builds designed to give you an economic advantage on the ladder; or alternatively, remove your opponent's capability to acquire resources through unexpected cheese timings which remove their workers from the game.
